text: I'm Joseph porier with bizaar voice vice
president of strategic technology growth
generative AI is a powerful technology
that allows users and employees to
become more productive now developers
can prototype and realize a new AI idea
in minutes however sometimes developers
also have to take into account the risks
associated with generative models and
how they impact ethics safety and
correctness I believe the general public
is has a misconception that generative
AI can actually understand things yes
they generalize well but they actually
simply predict the next set of word or
words given an input text bizar voice
takes a two-pronged approach with our
ratings and reviews we extensively use
llm EV vowels to generate output based
on an initial set of model criteria then
in live deployment we put in guard rails
to ensure that the model doesn't
hallucinate AWS can continue to support
bizar Voice by investing in AWS bedrock
and Amazon Q bizar voice uses both of
those products extensively in the
Bedrock case they could help us by
releasing more foundational models
especially multimodal ones we use Amazon
Q as a way to put a large amount of data
into a repository to then run extensive
models against it so that we can
internally answer questions that
otherwise might take much longer to find
AWS can help bizar voice be more agile
we can focus on building new strategic
products for our clients or new
Innovative efficiency to improve our
internal costs rather than having to
rebuild everything from scratch
now
